author: yoavs
msg: test for JUnit presence, and fail with an informative message if JUnit is not present for the build.  Somewhat surprisingly, we need JUnit for the core compile target, as opposed to just the compileTests target, so do that test in compile as well.  Also a minor language improvement in tutorial.xml for the web site.
